name: The Avila Brothers
description: '''The Avila Brothers''', composed of Bobby "Ahvlah" Ross Avila and Issiah "Iz" J. Avila, are an American [[contemporary R&B|R&B]] producing and songwriting duo best known for their numerous contributions to [[Usher (musician)|Usher]] projects, including 2004 album ''[[Confessions (Usher album)|Confessions]]''. The brothers later won the [[Grammy Award for Best R&B Album]] for their contributions to [[Chaka Khan]] album ''[[Funk This]]''.
